divs: Sighting DetailsI noticed the other sighting near Gravois Bluffs and had to report it. While driving on Highway 141 South away from Gravois Bluffs about two or three miles, we noticed a floating orb looking orange object at the intersection of Highway 141 and 21. It seemed not to be moving and was very near some fireworks stands. I also like the other poster thought it looked somewhat like a balloon but as we passed under it did not appear to that. It was witnessed by both my wife and three daughters. It was odd I know that.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Arnold
There were no other sightings in Arnold on or around July 2nd 2010
